title: Mc Donalds LOGO and advertising typefaces
content: can anyone help me out what the typefaces are that Mc Donalds uses for their logo? and also in their current advertising campaigns with the claim I'm loving it? I am doing a school project and I URGENTLY need your help! thanks
author: fellrath

comments.content: The McDonald's logo is almost certainly custom. I believe the font they are using in ads these days is Akzidenz Grotesk or AG Old Face.

I know that on a lot of Danish McDonald's advertising [DIN 1451 Engschrift](http://web.archive.org/web/20050518125942/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/din-1451/) is used.   
   
Ain't ya just lovin' it?
